column4: hi ive made a fresh intall of ubuntu 8.10, when i go to alsamixer i cant only see the 'Master'? where is rest?
how do i look under preferences for alsamixer?
double click on the volume control and then click on prefences, you should be able so choose what volume controls you want.

Alsamixer v1.0.17, Usage: alsamixer [-h] [-c <card: 0...7> [-D <mixer device>] [-g] [-s] [V <view>] [-a <abst>] ...
2008-11-15T17:48:00.000Z	kri	richaoj	It opens right if i 'alsamixer -D hw:0' .. i want that to open with just 'alsamixer' as deafult
